fieldDescriptions.description: Allow devices to automatically update OS version. Controls whether managed ChromeOS devices install updates.
fieldDescriptions.name: Allow devices to automatically update OS version.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Controls whether managed ChromeOS devices install updates.

fieldDescriptions.description: Auto reboot after updates. Controls whether a managed ChromeOS device reboots after it is updated.
fieldDescriptions.name: Auto reboot after updates.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Controls whether a managed ChromeOS device reboots after it is updated.

fieldDescriptions.description: Updates over cellular. Controls whether a managed ChromeOS device updates over Wi-Fi and Ethernet only or using any connection type, including cellular.

knownValueDescriptions.description: Allow automatic updates over Wi-Fi and Ethernet only.
Allow automatic updates on all connections, including cellular.

fieldDescriptions.name: Updates over cellular.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Controls whether a managed ChromeOS device updates over Wi-Fi and Ethernet only or using any connection type, including cellular.

fieldDescriptions.description: Roll back to target version. To use a previous version, devices will need to be restarted. Devices will be wiped and all local data will be lost. Learn more about rolling back devices here: https://support.google.com/chrome/a?p=rollback.
fieldDescriptions.name: Roll back to target version.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: To use a previous version, devices will need to be restarted. Devices will be wiped and all local data will be lost. Learn more about rolling back devices here: https://support.google.com/chrome/a?p=rollback.

fieldDescriptions.description: Allows the admin to specify a timed rollout plan for automatic updates.

knownValueDescriptions.description: Default (devices should update as soon as a new version is available).
Roll out updates over a specific schedule.

fieldDescriptions.name: Allows the admin to specify a timed rollout plan for automatic updates.

fieldDescriptions.description: Allows the admin to specify time restrictions for when automatic updates take place.
fieldDescriptions.name: Allows the admin to specify time restrictions for when automatic updates take place.

fieldDescriptions.description: Specifies the prefix of a target version Google ChromeOS should update to. If the device is running a version that's before the specified prefix, it will update to the latest version with the given prefix. If the device is already on a later version, effects depend on the value of DeviceRollbackToTargetVersion.
fieldDescriptions.name: Specifies the prefix of a target version Google ChromeOS should update to. If the device is running a version that's before the specified prefix, it will update to the latest version with the given prefix. If the device is already on a later version, effects depend on the value of DeviceRollbackToTargetVersion.

fieldDescriptions.description: Final automatic update alert message. When a device reaches its last automatic update(https://support.google.com/chrome/a/answer/6220366)automatic , an alert is sent to the user. This text overrides the default message that will be shown on the device.
fieldDescriptions.name: Final automatic update alert message.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: When a device reaches its last automatic update(https://support.google.com/chrome/a/answer/6220366)automatic , an alert is sent to the user. This text overrides the default message that will be shown on the device.

fieldDescriptions.description: Sets the minimum version of ChromeOS a device must be updated to.

nestedFieldDescriptions.description: Extended period to update for Auto Update Expiration devices (AUE).
nestedFieldDescriptions.name: Extended period to update for Auto Update Expiration devices (AUE).

nestedFieldDescriptions.description: Period to block devices and user sessions after if the device is not update to chrome_version.
nestedFieldDescriptions.name: Period to block devices and user sessions after if the device is not update to chrome_version.

fieldDescriptions.name: Sets the minimum version of ChromeOS a device must be updated to.

fieldDescriptions.description: Update downloads. Controls whether update downloads use HTTP or HTTPS.
fieldDescriptions.name: Update downloads.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Controls whether update downloads use HTTP or HTTPS.

fieldDescriptions.description: Release channel. Changing the release channel can have drastic effects on the current organization and its children. Ensure any changes to this setting are intended. Learn more about release channels: https://support.google.com/chrome/a/answer/1375678#release_channel?hl={$languageCode}.
fieldDescriptions.name: Release channel.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Changing the release channel can have drastic effects on the current organization and its children. Ensure any changes to this setting are intended. Learn more about release channels: https://support.google.com/chrome/a/answer/1375678#release_channel?hl={$languageCode}.

fieldDescriptions.description: Peer to peer. Controls whether peer to peer auto update downloads are allowed.

knownValueDescriptions.description: Allow peer to peer auto update downloads.
Do not allow peer to peer auto update downloads.

fieldDescriptions.name: Peer to peer.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Controls whether peer to peer auto update downloads are allowed.

notices.noticeMessage: Keep in mind: 1) To use a previous version, devices will need to be restarted. Devices will be wiped and all local data will be lost. 2) Rollback to ChromeOS version 106 or earlier is not supported. Learn more about rolling back devices here: https://support.google.com/chrome/a?p=rollback.

fieldDescriptions.description: Impacted devices are allowed to receive updates during the extended auto-update period. Allow eligible devices that will lose Android support to be opted in to Extended Automatic Updates. If the policy is Enabled, devices will opt in to Extended Automatic Updates. If the policy is Disabled or unset, devices will stop receiving updates after the original Auto Update Expiration date. This policy is only relevant for older models not automatically receiving extended updates.

knownValueDescriptions.description: Allow updates during extended auto-update period.
Disallow updates during extended auto-update period.

fieldDescriptions.name: Impacted devices are allowed to receive updates during the extended auto-update period.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Allow eligible devices that will lose Android support to be opted in to Extended Automatic Updates. If the policy is Enabled, devices will opt in to Extended Automatic Updates. If the policy is Disabled or unset, devices will stop receiving updates after the original Auto Update Expiration date. This policy is only relevant for older models not automatically receiving extended updates.

fieldDescriptions.description: Allows the admin to control auto update version by choosing an app whose manifest will govern update behavior.
fieldDescriptions.name: Allows the admin to control auto update version by choosing an app whose manifest will govern update behavior.

name: customers/C022n8w1u/policySchemas/chrome.devices.WilcoScheduledUpdate

fieldDescriptions.description: Controls whether scheduled updates are enabled.
fieldDescriptions.name: Controls whether scheduled updates are enabled.

fieldDescriptions.description: Allows an admin to control the time of day that scheduled updates are applied.
fieldDescriptions.inputConstraint: The long field should have value greater than or equal to zero.
fieldDescriptions.name: Allows an admin to control the time of day that scheduled updates are applied.

fieldDescriptions.description: Controls how often (daily, weekly, monthly) the device should check for ChromeOS updates.
fieldDescriptions.name: Controls how often (daily, weekly, monthly) the device should check for ChromeOS updates.

fieldDescriptions.description: Specifies the day of the week on which weekly updates should occur.
fieldDescriptions.name: Specifies the day of the week on which weekly updates should occur.

fieldDescriptions.description: Specifies a day each month on which the device will check for updates.
fieldDescriptions.inputConstraint: The long field should have value greater than or equal to zero.
fieldDescriptions.name: Specifies a day each month on which the device will check for updates.

accessRestrictions: This policy only affects device types: Dell Latitude 5400 Chromebook Enterprise, Dell Latitude 5300 2-in-1 Chromebook Enterprise, Dell Latitude 7410 Chromebook Enterprise, Dell Latitude 7410 2-in-1 Chromebook Enterprise.

fieldDescriptions.description: Chrome Variations. Controls which Chrome Variations are enabled, disabled, or enabled for critical fixes only on devices.

knownValueDescriptions.description: Enable variations for critical fixes only.

fieldDescriptions.name: Chrome Variations.
fieldDescriptions.fieldDescription: Controls which Chrome Variations are enabled, disabled, or enabled for critical fixes only on devices.

notices.noticeMessage: Disabling variations significantly increases the risk of future security and compatibility issues and is not recommended.
